titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation to prevent the exacting of excessive prices of victuals, and other necessaries within the verge of His Majesties houshold.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the nineteenth day of May, 1674. in the six and twentieth year of our reign.
Steele notation: Arms 89 Our have 2) bring- or.
Two copies filmed consecutively at UMI Tracts Supplement reel C18; filmed copies consist of one contiguous sheet.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
